actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Social Security Act to require that each State disclose to the public (by categories) the names of all individuals who are recipients of aid or assistance under its plans approved under titles I, IV, X, XIV, and XVI of such Act.

summary.text: Requires that each State disclose to the public (by categories) the names of all individuals who are recipients of aid or assistance under its plans approved under titles I, IV, X, XIV, and XVI of the Social Security Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Social Security Act to require that each State disclose to the public (by categories) the names of all individuals who are recipients of aid or assistance under its plans approved under titles I, IV, X, XIV, and XVI of such Act.
